data.system_settings: MacBook Pro (13", Mid-2012), macOS 10.13.6 - Windows 10 Home (1803, x64)
data.actual_result: You cannot see the checkbox flipping until you unblock them again.
data.expected_result: The checkbox should show flipping regardless if the user is blocked or not.
data.short_description: Selecting to show a blocked user on the games tab will not update the checkbox.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a random user. - Make sure that "Show on Games Tab" is unchecked. - Block the user. - Right click them again, and click "Show on Games Tab". - The checkbox will not flip. - Unblock the user. - Right click again and observe the checkbox flipped.
